subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The Transit antlib provides basic tasks that deliver the bootstrap functionality needed to load the full Magic system. The antlib includes an init, import, get, and plugin tasks. The init task is used to established a number of transit related ant properties, a build listener, and a component helper. The plugin task is used to load antlibs, taskdefs, typedefs and build listeners using classloaders established relative to resources managed by the transit system. The import task provides support artifact based inclusion of build templates. The get task provides support for the retrieval of resources using artifact references.
